channel.title: Hugo, Development, DigitalOcean on Summitt Dweller's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo, Development, DigitalOcean on Summitt Dweller's Blog

item.title: My Hugo Timeline
item.description: What follows is an excerpt from this blog’s README.md file. I’ve successfully added the code to drive a new /timeline page as part of this blog, but I did so “locally”, and now I’d like to repeat the process but using the aforementioned SummittDweller/hugo-timelinemodule. I used guidance found in Hugo Modules: Getting Started to make this happen, like so: ╭─mark@Marks-Mac-Mini ~/GitHub/blogs-SummittDweller ‹main› ╰─$ brew install go ╭─mark@Marks-Mac-Mini ~/GitHub/blogs-SummittDweller ‹main› ╰─$ brew upgrade # This is not "required", but probably overdue.
